content.question: Which of the following molecules has the largest dipole moment?

choices.label: The figure shows a B r atom with three pairs of nonbonding electrons connected by a single bond to an F atom with three pairs of nonbonding electrons.

The figure shows an S atom with two pairs of nonbonding electrons connected to a C atom by a double bond.Â The C atom is connected by a double bond to another S atom with two pairs of nonbonding electrons.

The figure shows an F atom with three pairs of nonbonding electrons connected to an B atom by a single bond. The B atom is connected by single bonds to two additional F atoms, each with three pairs of nonbonding electrons.
The figure shows a C atom connected by single bonds to four C l atoms, each with three pairs of nonbonding electrons.

content.answer: The figure shows a B r atom with three pairs of nonbonding electrons connected by a single bond to an F atom with three pairs of nonbonding electrons.

skill.text: 1.B: Describe the components of and quantitative information from models and representations that illustrate both particulate-level and macroscopic- level properties.
